channel.title: ! urgent help please!
channel.description:
this realy isnt a server problem but a problem i got while trying to make my server (if ya get me)
i changed my path on system enviroment variables to PATH and the path is
C:\Server;D:\Server\php;C:\Windows\System32
this is wat a guide on how to make a server on these forums told me to do , the point im geting at is my nortan antivirus wont activate. it wont start when my comp starts and it wont let me start it manualy, can some1 please tell me wat the path was be4 it got changed i think this mite help.
name of enviroment varaible "path" cant remember the path that was there.
new name PATH new path C:\Server;D:\Server\php;C:\Windows\System32
start>control panel>system>advanced>enviroment variables
I NEED URGENT HELP!! please help. msn jordanaintmyname@hotmail.co.uk
update: my computer ran a chkdsk and it deleted a index settings. bak hasnt done anything to help.[br][size=1]Posted on: May 12, 2007, 07:05:37 PM[/size][hr]still need help please.

item.title: ! urgent help please!
item.dc:creator: @The_Mentor The Mentor
item.description:
@The_Mentor wrote:

Ehhh, you mean when you changed the path it messed up your Norton?

Read full topic
